name: SparseNumericFactorOptions
desc: A structure that contains options that affect the numerical stage of a sparse factorization.

items.name: init(control: SparseControl_t, scalingMethod: SparseScaling_t, scaling: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, pivotTolerance: Double, zeroTolerance: Double)
items.desc: Returns a new numeric factor options structure with the specified properties.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new numeric factor options structure with default properties.

items.name: var control: SparseControl_t
items.desc: The flags that control the computation.

items.name: var scaling: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: An array that scales the matrix before factorization.

items.name: struct SparseScaling_t
items.desc: Options that define which scaling algorithm to use.

items.name: var pivotTolerance: Double
items.desc: The pivot tolerance that threshold partial pivoting uses.

items.name: var zeroTolerance: Double
items.desc: The zero tolerance that some pivoting modes use.
